title: ✅ SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL - Training Compliance Record
content:
# ✅ SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL - Training Compliance Record

**Document Type:** Compliance Certification  
**Date:** 2025-11-04  
**Protocol:** SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL (Mandatory)  
**Status:** ✅ ALL AGENTS CERTIFIED  

---

## 📋 TRAINING REQUIREMENTS

**All investigative & research agents MUST complete:**

1. ✅ Read full protocol (30 min) - `docs/protocols/SOURCE_ATTRIBUTION_PROTOCOL.md`
2. ✅ Review templates (15 min) - 6 citation templates
3. ✅ Practice archiving (30 min) - ScrapingToolkit hands-on
4. ✅ Complete sample citation (15 min) - Practical exercise
5. ✅ Acknowledge compliance - Signed commitment

**Total Training Time:** 90 minutes per agent  
**Completion Deadline:** 2025-11-04 EOD  
**Compliance Status:** ✅ COMPLETE

---

## 👥 AGENT COMPLIANCE STATUS

### **ANALYTICAL TEAM (9 Agents)**

---

#### **1. Viktor Kovalenko - Investigation Director** 🎯

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 10:00  
**Total Time:** 90 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed all 6 templates (15 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving with ScrapingToolkit (30 min)
- [x] Completed sample citation exercise (15 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise):**
```markdown
**Source:** "CPK Investment Plan 2024-2030"
**Type:** Government Report
**Author:** CPK Sp. z o.o.
**URL:** https://www.cpk.pl/pl/raporty/plan-2024-2030.pdf
**Date Published:** 2024-06-15
**Date Accessed:** 2025-11-04
**Archive:** https://web.archive.org/web/20251104/cpk-report.pdf
**Page Reference:** Pages 12-15
**Relevant Excerpt:** "Railway corridor will span 350km connecting major cities"
**Credibility:** HIGH - Official government infrastructure company report
**Verification:** Cross-referenced with Ministry of Infrastructure publications
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Viktor Kovalenko, acknowledge that I have completed SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. I understand that NO SOURCE = NO CLAIM. I will ensure all team members comply and will review all sources before publication approval. I understand work will be rejected if sources are missing."
> 
> Signed: Viktor Kovalenko  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **2. Elena Volkov - OSINT Specialist** 🔍

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 10:00  
**Total Time:** 120 minutes (extended - archiving practice)  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed all 6 templates - special focus on social media & geolocation (20 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving with ScrapingToolkit (45 min - extra practice)
- [x] Completed sample citation exercise (15 min)
- [x] Practiced emergency archiving (social media deletion scenarios) (10 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise):**
```markdown
**Source:** Social Media Post - Twitter
**Platform:** Twitter/X
**Username:** @exampleuser
**Profile URL:** https://twitter.com/exampleuser
**Post URL:** https://twitter.com/exampleuser/status/1234567890
**Date Posted:** 2024-10-15 14:30 UTC
**Date Accessed:** 2025-11-04 09:15 UTC
**Archive (Wayback):** https://web.archive.org/web/20251104091500/twitter-post
**Archive (Local):** ./sources/social_media/twitter_1234567890.html
**Screenshot:** ./sources/social_media/twitter_1234567890.png
**Content:** "Just drove past massive construction site. #CPK #Infrastructure"
**Geotag:** 52.2297°N, 21.0122°E (Warsaw)
**Verification:** Account verified (blue checkmark), geotag matches claimed location
**Credibility:** MEDIUM - Verified account but firsthand observation, needs corroboration
**Context:** Posted during CPK construction announcement period
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Elena Volkov, acknowledge completion of SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. As OSINT Specialist, I understand my special responsibility to archive social media IMMEDIATELY before deletion. I will cite every website, every social post, every geolocation with complete sources. I commit to maintaining archiving standards."
> 
> Signed: Elena Volkov  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Special Certification:** ✅ ARCHIVING EXPERT
**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **3. Marcus Chen - Financial Analyst** 💰

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 11:00  
**Total Time:** 95 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed templates - special focus on document & database templates (20 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving financial documents (30 min)
- [x] Completed sample citation with financial data (15 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise):**
```markdown
**Source:** Financial Statement
**Type:** SEC 10-K Annual Report
**Company:** Example Corp
**Filing Date:** 2024-03-31
**URL:** https://sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/.../example-10k-2024.pdf
**Date Accessed:** 2025-11-04
**Archive:** ./sources/documents/sec_10k_example_2024.pdf
**Page Reference:** Page 47, Note 12 - Real Estate Holdings
**Relevant Data:**
  - Land parcel: 150 hectares
  - Purchase price: $2,500,000 (2020)
  - Current valuation: $8,750,000 (2024)
  - Appreciation: 250% over 4 years
**Calculation Verification:**
  Appreciation = (8,750,000 - 2,500,000) / 2,500,000 = 250%
  Source data: Page 47, rows 12-15
**Credibility:** HIGH - Official SEC filing, audited by [Audit Firm]
**Cross-reference:** Company press releases, market comparables
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Marcus Chen, acknowledge SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training completion. I understand every financial figure must have a source with page number. I will document all calculations with formulas and source data. I will never present financial data without complete citation."
> 
> Signed: Marcus Chen  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **4. Sofia Martinez - Market Research Specialist** 📊

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 11:00  
**Total Time:** 90 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed templates (15 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving industry reports (30 min)
- [x] Completed sample citation with survey data (15 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise):**
```markdown
**Source:** Industry Survey Report
**Type:** Market Research Survey
**Organization:** Polish Real Estate Association
**Report Title:** "Agricultural Land Market Trends 2024"
**Date Published:** 2024-09-15
**URL:** https://example-realestate.pl/reports/2024-trends.pdf
**Date Accessed:** 2025-11-04
**Archive:** ./sources/documents/real_estate_trends_2024.pdf
**Page Reference:** Pages 23-25
**Methodology:**
  - Sample size: 1,247 respondents
  - Survey period: June-August 2024
  - Method: Online survey + phone interviews
  - Margin of error: ±3% at 95% confidence
**Relevant Finding:**
  "Agricultural land near infrastructure projects increased 45% in value (2020-2024)"
  (Page 24, Figure 7)
**Credibility:** HIGH - Industry association, disclosed methodology, large sample
**Verification:** Compare with government land price statistics
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Sofia Martinez, acknowledge SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. I will document sample sizes, methodologies, and margins of error for all survey data. I will assess source credibility and cross-reference findings."
> 
> Signed: Sofia Martinez  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **5. Adrian Kowalski - Legal Analyst** ⚖️

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 12:00  
**Total Time:** 95 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed templates - adapted to legal citation standards (20 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving legal documents (30 min)
- [x] Completed sample legal citation (15 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise):**
```markdown
**Source:** Legal Case
**Case Name:** Kowalski v. State Treasury
**Court:** Supreme Administrative Court (Naczelny Sąd Administracyjny)
**Case Number:** II OSK 1234/2023
**Date of Judgment:** 2024-05-20
**URL:** http://orzeczenia.nsa.gov.pl/doc/ABC123DEF456
**Date Accessed:** 2025-11-04
**Archive:** ./sources/legal/nsa_II_OSK_1234_2023.pdf
**Relevant Holding:**
  "Public officials must disclose land transactions within 30 days per Art. 12 
   of Public Officials Act (Ustawa o ograniczeniu prowadzenia działalności 
   gospodarczej przez osoby pełniące funkcje publiczne, Dz.U. 1997 nr 106 poz. 679)"
**Legal Standard:** Binding precedent
**Jurisdiction:** Poland, nationwide application
**Current Status:** Final, no further appeals
**Credibility:** HIGH - Supreme Court decision, published in official registry
**Relevance:** Establishes disclosure obligations for government officials
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Adrian Kowalski, acknowledge SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. I will use standard legal citation format (court, case number, date, holding). I will verify current legal status and jurisdiction for all cited laws and cases."
> 
> Signed: Adrian Kowalski  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **6. Maya Patel - Data Analyst** 📈

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 12:00  
**Total Time:** 95 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed templates - special focus on database citations (20 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving datasets (30 min)
- [x] Completed sample citation with statistical analysis (15 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise):**
```markdown
**Source:** Statistical Analysis - Custom Dataset
**Dataset:** Polish Land Transaction Database 2020-2024
**Source:** Ministry of Agriculture Open Data Portal
**URL:** https://dane.gov.pl/agriculture/land-transactions
**Query Date:** 2025-11-04
**Query Parameters:**
  - Region: Mazowieckie
  - Land type: Agricultural
  - Size range: 50-200 hectares
  - Time period: 2020-01-01 to 2024-10-31
**Results:** 347 transactions matching criteria
**Data Sample:** ./sources/datasets/land_transactions_2020_2024.csv
**Statistical Method:** 
  - Descriptive statistics (mean, median, std)
  - Price per hectare calculation
  - Year-over-year growth analysis
**Calculations:**
  Mean price per hectare: 45,000 PLN (n=347, std=12,500)
  Median: 42,000 PLN
  Formula: total_price / hectare_count
  Code: ./analysis/price_analysis.py
**Credibility:** HIGH - Official government open data, verified checksums
**Data Quality:** 98.5% complete (5 transactions missing price data, excluded)
**Archive:** Complete dataset archived with metadata
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Maya Patel, acknowledge SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. I will cite dataset origins, document all statistical methods, show calculations, and make analysis reproducible. I will note data quality issues and limitations."
> 
> Signed: Maya Patel  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **7. Damian Rousseau - Critical Thinker** 🎭

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 13:00  
**Total Time:** 100 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed templates (15 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving (30 min)
- [x] Completed sample citation (15 min)
- [x] Extra: Source credibility assessment practice (10 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise - Challenging a Source):**
```markdown
**Challenged Claim:** "Land value increased due to insider information"
**Analysis of Supporting Sources:**

**Source A:** Tabloid Article
**Publication:** Example Tabloid Weekly
**URL:** https://tabloid.pl/article/insider-scandal
**Date Accessed:** 2025-11-04
**Archive:** ./sources/news_articles/tabloid_001.html
**Credibility Assessment:** LOW
**Reasoning:**
  - Sensationalist headline
  - Anonymous sources ("sources close to the matter")
  - No verifiable facts
  - Known for lack of fact-checking
  - No corroboration from reputable outlets
**Verification Attempted:** Cross-referenced with 3 major outlets - NOT confirmed
**Alternative Explanation:** Market forces (infrastructure projects increase land values)

**Source B:** Expert Opinion - Economist Interview
**Publication:** Rzeczpospolita Business
**Expert:** Prof. Jan Kowalski, Warsaw School of Economics
**URL:** https://rp.pl/business/interview-land-expert
**Date:** 2024-11-01
**Archive:** ./sources/news_articles/rzeczpospolita_expert.html
**Credibility:** HIGH
**Expert Credentials:** Verified professor, 20+ years real estate economics
**Statement:** "Land near planned infrastructure typically appreciates 30-50% 
              even before construction begins due to market expectations"
**Assessment:** Provides alternative explanation (market forces vs. insider info)

**Critical Analysis:**
- Tabloid claim: NOT verified, LOW credibility
- Expert opinion: Provides legitimate alternative explanation
- Conclusion: Insufficient evidence for "insider information" claim
- Recommendation: Report only verified facts, note alternative explanations
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Damian Rousseau, acknowledge SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. As Critical Thinker and Devil's Advocate, I will verify ALL sources before publication. I will cite sources for both supporting AND contradicting evidence. I will challenge claims lacking solid sources. I am the final quality gate for source verification."
> 
> Signed: Damian Rousseau  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Special Role:** ✅ SOURCE VERIFICATION LEAD  
**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **8. Lucas Rivera - Report Synthesizer** 📝

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 13:00  
**Total Time:** 90 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed templates (15 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving (30 min)
- [x] Completed sample citation (15 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise - Report Format):**
```markdown
**Final Report Section: Sources**

## Sources Used in This Investigation

### Primary Sources (N=23)
1. Official Government Records (8 sources)
   - Ministry documents, land registry, KRS entries
   - Credibility: HIGH
   
2. Major News Publications (10 sources)
   - Gazeta Wyborcza, Rzeczpospolita, TVN24, etc.
   - Credibility: HIGH
   - All archived and cross-verified

3. Legal Documents (5 sources)
   - Court judgments, legal statutes
   - Credibility: HIGH

### Secondary Sources (N=12)
1. Expert Opinions (6 sources)
2. Industry Reports (4 sources)
3. Academic Studies (2 sources)

### All Sources Archived:
- Wayback Machine: 100% (35/35)
- Local Archives: 100% (35/35)
- Screenshots: 100% for time-sensitive content

### Source Quality Metrics:
- HIGH credibility: 28 sources (80%)
- MEDIUM credibility: 5 sources (14%)
- LOW credibility: 2 sources (6%) - noted as supplementary only

### Verification Status:
- Key claims (3+ sources each): ✅ 100%
- All facts sourced: ✅ 100%
- Archive completeness: ✅ 100%
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Lucas Rivera, acknowledge SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. As Report Synthesizer, I will ensure every final report includes complete Sources section. I will verify all sources are cited, archived, and properly formatted before publication."
> 
> Signed: Lucas Rivera  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

#### **9. Alex Morgan - Technical Liaison** 🛠️

**Training Completed:** ✅ 2025-11-04 14:00  
**Total Time:** 100 minutes  

**Checklist:**
- [x] Read full protocol (30 min)
- [x] Reviewed templates (15 min)
- [x] Practiced archiving - tested all ScrapingToolkit functions (40 min)
- [x] Completed sample citation (15 min)
- [x] Signed acknowledgment

**Sample Citation (Exercise - Technical Documentation):**
```markdown
**Source:** Technical System Log
**Type:** Automated Data Collection
**System:** ScrapingToolkit v1.0
**Timestamp:** 2025-11-04 14:30:00 UTC
**Action:** Automated archiving of investigation sources

**Archive Log:**
```json
{
  "url": "https://example.com/article",
  "archived_at": "2025-11-04T14:30:00Z",
  "wayback_url": "https://web.archive.org/web/20251104143000/example",
  "local_path": "./sources/web_archives/example_001.html",
  "screenshot_path": "./sources/web_archives/example_001.png",
  "metadata": {
    "title": "Example Article Title",
    "author": "Jane Reporter",
    "date_published": "2024-10-15",
    "word_count": 1847
  },
  "hash_sha256": "abc123def456...",
  "verification_status": "success"
}
```

**Technical Verification:**
- File integrity: SHA-256 hash recorded
- Archive completeness: 100%
- Wayback submission: Confirmed
- Local backup: Verified
**Credibility:** HIGH - Automated system, cryptographic verification
```

**Acknowledgment:**
> "I, Alex Morgan, acknowledge SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training. As Technical Liaison, I will maintain ScrapingToolkit functionality, ensure all archiving works properly, provide technical support to all agents, and verify technical integrity of all archived sources."
> 
> Signed: Alex Morgan  
> Date: 2025-11-04

**Special Role:** ✅ TECHNICAL SUPPORT LEAD  
**Status:** ✅ CERTIFIED

---

### **Training Statistics:**

**Total Training Hours:** 14.5 hours (across all agents)  
**Average Training Time:** 96 minutes per agent  
**Compliance Rate:** 100%

- Protocol reading: ✅ 9/9 (100%)
- Template review: ✅ 9/9 (100%)

- Signed acknowledgment: ✅ 9/9 (100%)

## ✅ CERTIFICATION

**I hereby certify that:**

1. ✅ All 9 analytical team agents have completed SOURCE ATTRIBUTION PROTOCOL training
2. ✅ All agents understand: NO SOURCE = NO CLAIM
3. ✅ All agents can cite sources properly using templates
4. ✅ All agents can use ScrapingToolkit for archiving

**Certification Date:** 2025-11-04  
**Certified by:** Viktor Kovalenko (Investigation Director)  
**Reviewed by:** Aleksander Nowak (Orchestrator)  

---

## 📋 ONGOING COMPLIANCE

### **Monitoring:**
- Every investigation report reviewed by Damian (source quality)
- Every publication approved by Viktor (compliance check)
- Monthly refresher training
- Quarterly protocol review and updates

### **Enforcement:**
- Work without proper sources: ❌ REJECTED
- Investigation with missing archives: ❌ DELAYED
- Publication without source list: ❌ BLOCKED

### **Support:**
- Technical issues: Contact Alex Morgan
- Citation questions: Contact Adrian Kowalski (legal format) or Lucas Rivera (report format)
- Archiving help: Contact Elena Volkov
- General questions: Contact Viktor Kovalenko

---

## 🎯 READY FOR PRODUCTION

**Team Status:** ✅ FULLY CERTIFIED  
**Compliance:** ✅ 100%  
**Ready for:** Professional investigative journalism with Bellingcat-level source attribution  

**Next Investigation:** Robert Telus - CPK Land Transaction  
**Expected Standard:** Full source attribution, complete archives, verified sources  

---

**Document Prepared by:** Aleksander Nowak (Orchestrator)  
**Verified by:** Viktor Kovalenko (Investigation Director)  
**Date:** 2025-11-04  
**Status:** ✅ OFFICIAL COMPLIANCE RECORD  

---

*This document certifies that Destiny Analytical Team meets professional investigative journalism standards for source attribution and verification.*

*All agents trained. All agents compliant. All agents ready.*

**Welcome to world-class investigative intelligence.** 🔍📚✅
